Member Function Documentation

bool SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders ( const std::string &  modelFilePath,
const std::string &  headerMapType,
std::map< std::string, std::string * > &  headerMap,
const char *  headerMapValueDelimiter = NULL 
) [static]

SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders Given a potentional model file return the headers.

Model files can be of type db, A5, or TSV.

Parameters:
modelFilePath - the models file, posterior or prior
headerMapType - 1.) empty for just the raw headers 2.) "GTC4.1" - GTC 4.1 map
headerMap - return header key/value pairs
headerMapValueDelimiter 
  • return multiple header values using delimiter If this value is passed in then all ambiguous matching header values are returned delimited by the passed in value. If this value is not passed (NULL) then only the first value of the first qualifying header is returned.
Returns:
- true if the file qualifies as a models file, false otherwise.
